content: अवसः [अव्-असच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 117</ls>; अवतीत्यवसो राजा भानुश्च <ls>Ujjval.</ls>] {@--1@} A king. {@--2@} The sun. {@--3@} A kind of tree (अर्क). --सं {@--1@} Refreshment, food, provision (especially for a journey), {%viaticum%} (°सः also); एतत्ते रुद्रावसं <ls>Yv. 3. 61.</ls> {@--2@} Preserving, protecting.
